text:
Our nation is facing a crisis with coronavirus, unlike any we’ve experienced before.
 
The Administration was slow to respond. Now, the estimates are that 100,000 may die.
 
The first person Trump fired?
 
The Captain who begged for help for his crew.
https://t.co/7VuBjDjWoH
